segments.text: I notice the water is just flowing right out of the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really pushing his luck with that stool—it’s so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s ever fallen before and just doesn’t learn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie like it’s completely normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this whole scene is just waiting to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so oblivious, it’s almost impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops this before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
